p: We observed similar patterns in the proteomic data: there were more enriched GO terms in A. cepistipes than A. ostoyae. In A. ostoyae, we found 18 and 12 significantly enriched terms in M vsNIM and R vsNIR, respectively ( Figure 2B), whereas, in A. cepistipes, there were 35 significantly enriched terms in M vsNIM and 19 in R vsNIR ( Supplementary Figure S4B). Terms enriched in M vsNIM included pectinesterase activity, polygalacturonase activity, cellulose-binding, carbohydrate-binding, hydrolase activity, together with cell wall modification, cell wall-related terms, and sugar metabolic process.
